A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I like the latest iteration of the Star Wars sage\, The Last Jedi\, however I did not love it like I should have. Without any spoilers\, I thought the story was a bit weak with some plot holes. I didn't particular care for the direction that they took some of the characters. Despite this\, there were aspects of the movie that were enjoyable and while it wasn't a perfect movie\, I can say I did enjoy it overall.
